Description: For sale is a Danelectro DC59 Cherry Sunburst 12 string electric guitar. It is in good used condition and sounds great. Cosmetically there are and some light surface scratches and two minor dings on the back edges of the body . The Kluson tuners are very good and have a smooth gear ratio for very accurate and stable tuning. The neck is straight with a medium low action and the lipstick pickups allow you to get the chime you'd expect from the bridge p/u and more mellow tones from the neck p/u. Case is not included. Shipping is to the U.S. Lower 48 and Canada only. Please ask all questions before bidding. Danelectro DC59 12 String Electric Guitar, Cherry Sunburst Overview: The Danelectro DC59 12 String features dual single-coil lipstick style pickups with a 3-way pickup selector allowing you to isolate separate pickups or combine them. The Danelectro lipstick pickups run in series, resulting in a humbucker-like sound without sacrificing single-coil transparency. The DC59 has a classic shorthorn body design constructed from lightweight Masonite material, which gives the guitar it's trademark resonant tone. The f hole on this guitar is a welcome addition, along with the stunning cherry sunburst finish, both of these features contribute to the guitar's unmistakable vintage vibe. Specifications: Body & Bridge •Body Material: Masonite •Body Style: Shorthorn shape, hollow body •Body Construction: Hollow with solid centre core tape binding •Finish: Cherry Sunburst •Bridge: Adjustable Neck & Fingerboard •Neck Material: Maple •Neck Shape: C Shape •Neck Construction: Bolt-On •Fretboard: Rosewood •Scale Length: 25" / 635mm •Frets: 21 Electronics & Hardware •Pickups: 2 x Lipsticks Alnico Magnets •Tuners: Enclosed 'Kluson' Style •Controls: 1 Volume, 1 Tone, 3 Way Selector •Hardware: Chrome •Number of Strings: 12
Title: Danelectro DC59CSB Cherry Sunburst Semi-hollow body 12 String Electric Guitar
